alert.note: Alert for Door (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 06 at 6:37AM CST until January 06 at 3:00PM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...PERIODS OF SNOW SHOWERS WILL CONTINUE ACROSS THE DOOR PENINSULA TODAY... .Bands of lake-enhanced snow showers will continue to affect Door County today, before tapering off late in the day or this evening. Gusty northwest winds will also produce some blowing and drifting snow, especially this morning. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow. An additional snow accumulation of 2 to 4 inches is expected. Northwest winds gusting to 25 mph this morning will produce some blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Door County. * WHEN...Until 3 PM CST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Roads are likely to be snow covered and slippery. The visibility may be limited during the heaviest snow showers, especially at locations near the shore of the Bay of Green Bay.
info.instruction: Plan on slower than normal travel conditions and be sure to check the latest weather and road conditions before heading out on the roads. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
